account_financials_step3_text3: (including VAT) is now awaiting for your payment; Choose between Paypal or Bank Transfer for paying this order. Depending on your choice, it will take some time to affect your balance.

account_financials_step3_bank_tranfer_te: You can use your bank to make the payment, but it will take sometime to affect your balance cause bank times. In next steps we will show you our bank details for make the transfer.

batch_send_text_you_can_send: You can send multiple batch messages using a file, with this format:

campaign_compose_compose_step_3_if_enabl: If enabled, system will wait for a human voice answer before delivering your message and, if not detected, it will not deliver. If disabled, all recipients may listen your voice message after they pick up the phone
campaign_overview_index_search_or_filter: Search or filter your created voice messages
campaign_overview_index_find_here_all: Find here all your saved, scheduled and sent voice messages
campaign_overview_index_here_you_will_fi: Here you will find all your saved, scheduled and sent voice messages once created
campaign_overview_index_go_on_the_compos: Go on the Compose New button and send now your first message. It`s more easy than you could think!!!
campaign_statistics_search_or_filter: Search or filter values, to see the result of your voice messages delivery
campaign_template_index_templates_can_be: Templates can be created as blueprint for messages you’ll send more often.
call_create_a_new_clickToCall_snippets_o: Create a new ClickToCall Snippets or filter/show it
call_again_your_clicks_remove_from_pendi: Call again your Clicks, remove from pending, add notes, export statistics directly from this page.Click that are not connected successfully are auto-marked as “Pending”.
snippet_please_choose_caller_ids: Please choose the call destination phone number
text_description: This text is happy and original; perfectly fitted for your website users.
preview_text: Want to talk with us?  Let’s do it now, totally free of charge! Tell us your phonenumber and we will  #ring you just immediately.
by_clicking_above_button: By clicking above button you agree to the Terms & Conditions
cannot_answer_now: Cannot answer now? Try to schedule this call later!
sound_text: Your website users will hear a standard ringing tone when they will pickup the call generated by the snippet
custom_text_explication: Use our customization tool and the live preview, to generate your custom snippet; motivation on your users is the first key of your success!
use_below_space: Use below space to edit Snippet Text
soundfile_custom_text: You can customize the sounds heard by your website users by using a Custom Soundfile;  it can contain a voice or a custom music (or both of them).   For example, you can use a voice telling “Hello, we are happy to receive your call request; wait just a moment, we are connecting your free call to one of our agents” and some music.  Be Careful: if the Custom Soundfile duration time is less than user waiting time, then it will be repeated from the beginning.
calls_destinations_text: When a ClickToCall is successfully connected to a requesting website user, we will try to connect him with you by calling you at one of your phonenumbers (should be a Caller Id already active in your Settings). If multiple additionals destinations are available, you can select them from here.
wait_time_limit_text: Our Callburn Technology will try to connect your website users with you until they will keep active the received call (means, until they will stay waiting at the phone, hearing the ringing tone or your Soundfile). If your destinations are busy or not available, we will wait some seconds and retry. During this time you will be billed, so you can set a maximium wait time from there; when he will be reached, the call will hangup by us and you will be able to call again the number from your Snippet statistics. For your security we don’t allow you to set an unlimited time.
allowed_country_text: By default, we allow only the same Country as your chosen destination; in this scenario, only your website users that have got an international prefix like yours, will be allowed to reach you. You can enable additionals countries from here. Remember; if the source country has got an higher tariff than destination country, you will pay the highest one (only one price, you will never pay two different tariffs).
connect_calls_to: Connect calls to - click to select/unselect
available: Available - Click on it to add
search\/filter_text: Search/filter by Country Name or Prefix
allowed_days_hours_text: As explained before, when a website user uses your ClickToCall snippet, our system will try to reach you at your configured destinations phonenumbers. You may want to limit your availability, so you can choose on which days and hours you will allow sending the calls through the snippet.  Outside your chosen scheduled times, the snippet will change appearance as the displayed one, to notify the user that service is not available at the moment and to invite him to schedule a call based on your chosen schedules.
your_time_should_be: At this moment, your time should be
custom_range_mouseover: You may add up to 4 multiple custom ranges
allowed_domains_text: For your security, we will allow snippet requests coming only from your authorized URL’s; unauthorized Snippets will throw an error.
enabled_domains: Enabled Domains (comma separed - subdomains wildcard with “*” symbol)
snippet_name: Tag this Snippet with a name
music_mouseover: Sounds that your website users will hear during attempts to connect the call with you
compose_step_1_header: From this screen you can compose a new voice message and send it in only 3 steps.

compose_step_3_header: Now you can configure interactions or just review your voice message before sending it

blacklist_me_interaction_modal_text_you_: You have chosen to enable this interaction
blacklist_me_interaction_modal_text_acti: Activating this feature may cause variations of final message length cause a second message played to your recipient
blacklist_me_interaction_modal_text_when: When your recipient asks for a Call Me Back, a second voice message should be reproduced to inform him about request acknowledgement. You must put a second message for this reason.
blacklist_me_interaction_modal_text_if_y: If you have any doubt or question, feel free to contact us over chat.
callmeback_interaction_modal_red_text_se: A second voice message is played like we received your request, thank you
callmeback_interaction_modal_text_you_ca: You can find all the CallMeBack requests into message statistics
blacklist_me_interaction_modal_text_in_t: In the next step you must choose a acknowledgement voice message
callback_modal_method1_text: Write a text and get it converted to voice by TTS technology
callback_modal_method2_text: Upload an audio file or use drag and drop feature
callback_modal_method4_red_text: Your message will appear below once created or uploaded
check_container_text: I want to activate the feature and i have understood that activation can affect final message length and the billing of a secondary call with a normal message tariff.
blacklist_me_interaction_modal_text_when: When your recipient asks for a “Blacklist me” interaction, a second voice message should be reproduced to inform him about request acknowledgement and his phonenumber should be deleted or deactivated for messages reception. In some countries, “Blacklist me” feature can be a legal requirement.
blacklist_me_interaction_modal_text_you_: You can find all the Blacklist Me requests into message statistics.
activate_new_interaction_modal_text_you_: You have chosen to enable this interaction
replay_interaction_modal_text_activating: Activating this feature may cause variations of final message length
replay_interaction_modal_text_for_exampl: for example, if your total message lenght is 20’’ and anyone of your recipients use “Replay Voice Message”, your message will be replayed, and total message length can become 40’’ affecting message price, see more into Docs
replay_interaction_modal_text_for_your_s: For your security, this action can be repeated until a maximum of three times.
check_container_text1: I want to activate the feature and i have understood that activation can affect final message length and price only in case of recipients use (max 3 times)
blacklist_me_interaction_modal_text_acti: Activating this feature may cause variations of final message length including a second call to your callerid for make transfer possible
blacklist_me_interaction_modal_text_when: When your recipient asks for a Live Transfer, a second call to your CallerID number is made, and if successful, you will be connected to your recipient call (the one which is delivering voice message). In this way we bill two different costs, one for message and another one for transfering this messagecall to your callerid, at the same tariffs as normal messages (see more into Docs). Look below graphics to see an example.
blacklist_me_interaction_modal_text_call: Callburn launch the first call to
linetransfer_interaction_modal_red_text_: recipient requesting a transfer listens for a ringing tone until the second call is answered
blacklist_me_interaction_modal_text_seco: A second call to your phone is
blacklist_me_interaction_modal_text_reme: Remember to keep your Caller ID ready for receiving calls (free and under network coverage) If your callerid only supports 1 concurrent call consider limiting messages speed
blacklist_me_interaction_modal_text_in_c: In case of busy Caller ID, Callburn retries to deliver the transfer as long the recipients stays waiting on to be connected
blacklist_me_interaction_modal_text_you_: You can limit concurrent transfers on your phonenumber.This is useful when the phonenumber (your caller id ) receiving live transfers doesn’t accepts more simultaneous calls (example, a mobile support only one people talking)
blacklist_me_interaction_modal_text_when: When this limit is reach we will stop delivery until the value is less than configured
compose_compose_index_old_chose_one_or_m: Choose one or more phone numbers, from your caller ID list, where transfer calls
send_preview_modal_text_you_have_chosen: You have chosen to send a preview to your caller ID
send_preview_modal_text_a_callburn_voice: A Callburn Voice message will be sent to
send_preview_modal_text_this_will_billed: This will billed just like a normal voice message

voice_message_schedule_modal1_text_if_yo: If you want to split delivery through more days, you can add days using the relative button

message_delivery_speed_modal_text_with_t: With this setting, your 999 contacts will receive your message in
message_delivery_speed_modal_text_be_car: Be careful, if some of your recipients will not available to receive voice message (like busy phone, out of network coverage or no answers) our systems will retry delivery other 5 times between 5 minutes pauses. See more into Docs

by_clicking_above_button_you_agree_to_th: By clicking above button you agree to the

engaines_dashboard_dashboard_hete_is_the: Here is the overall count of your saved messages, that allow you to create a kind of message template and send it when it needs. Clicking here will redirect you in Overview table filtered by Draft messages
engaines_dashboard_dashboard_this_value_: This value keeps you updated about the amount of credit needed for sending all your scheduled messages. Clicking here will redirect you in Overview table filtered by Scheduled messages
dashboard_tutorial_dashboard_is_the_plac: Dashboard is the place where you can have got everything under control like a boss
dashboard_tutorial_you_can_see_general: Here you can see general overview with delivery datails, save new templates and batch send
dashboard_tutorial_Import_export_and_org: Import, export and organize your recipients here. You can even group them, for a better use
dashboard_tutorial_implement_Callburn: Want to implement Callburn in your custom applications? Don’t worry, here you can find how to do that
dashboard_tutorial_this_section_to_answe: Use this section to answer to all your questions, or clarify your doubts, about all Callburn services
dashboard_tutorial_compose_and_send: Quickly compose and send your voice message in a few simple steps, clicking on this button
dashboard_tutorial_your_credit_or_activa: Recharge your credit or activate from here Autorecharge feature to make you free of thoughts
dashboard_tutorial_add_new_caller: Change email, password, add new caller id, or simple download your invoices; all your account settings are just here.
dashboard_tutorial_dashboard_is_clickabl: Every counter of this dashboard, once active, is clickable and will redirect you to the appropriate section of your account. For example, in case of scheduled messages (still not sent), you can find overall count here. Clicking will take you to message overview list for editing it.
dashboard_tutorial_may_need_some_help: Sometime you may need some help, so try to live chat with us; if we are not online, you can always drop a message from the same menu
dashboard_welcome_start_now_to: Start now to replace sms with
dashboard_welcome_you_can_reopen: You can reopen it whenever you want.

engaines_dashboard_you_can_find: You can find here the total of created messages still not sent or partially sent. Clicking here will redirect you in Overview table filtered by Scheduled messages
engaines_dashboard_dashboard_this_value_: This value shows the total number of your validated caller ids. Clicking here will redirect you in settings page where you may add or remove a caller id
engaines_dashboard_dashboard_here_is_the: Here is the overall count of all your imported contacts in Phonebook. Clicking here will redirect you in Contacts page of Phonebook’s section
engaines_dashboard_dashboard_lets_see_he: Let's see here the total number of message templates saved or created from you. Clicking here will redirect you in Templates table of Messages’s section
engaines_dashboard_dashboard_you_can_fin: You can find here total amount of your sent messages, indipendently if they have been delivered or not. Clicking here will redirect you in Overview Statistics with no filter
engaines_dashboard_dashboard_here_is_the: Here is the overall count of all your delivered messages. Clicking here will redirect you in Overview Statistics filtered by Delivered status
engaines_dashboard_dashboard_this_value_: This value is the ratio from all delivered messages over all sent messages, shown as a percentage
engaines_dashboard_dashboard_here_is_the: Here is the overall count of delivered messages with Live Transfer interaction. Clicking here will redirect you in Overview Statistics filtered by Transfer Interactions
engaines_dashboard_dashboard_count_of_de: Here is the overall count of delivered messages with Call me Back interaction. Clicking here will redirect you in Overview Statistics filtered by Callback Interactions
engaines_dashboard_dashboard_messages_wi: Here is the overall count of delivered messages with Blacklist interaction. Clicking here will redirect you in Overview Statistics filtered by Blacklist Interactions
engaines_dashboard_tutorial_here_is_the_: Here is the overall count of your saved messages, that allow you to create a kind of message template and send it when it needs. Clicking here will redirect you in Overview table filtered by Draft messages
engaines_dashboard_tutorial_you_can_find: You can find here the total of created messages still not sent or partially sent. Clicking here will redirect you in Overview table filtered by Scheduled messages
engaines_dashboard_tutorial_this_value_k: This value keeps you updated about the amount of credit needed for sending all your scheduled messages. Clicking here will redirect you in Overview table filtered by Scheduled messages
engaines_dashboard_tutorial_this_value_s: This value shows the total number of your validated caller ids. Clicking here will redirect you in settings page where you may add or remove a caller id
engaines_dashboard_tutorial_here_is_the_: Here is the overall count of all your imported contacts in Phonebook. Clicking here will redirect you in Contacts page of Phonebook’s section
engaines_dashboard_tutorial_number_of_me: Let's see here the total number of message templates saved or created from you. Clicking here will redirect you in Templates table of Messages’s section
engaines_dashboard_tutorial_here_total_a: You can find here total amount of your sent messages, indipendently if they have been delivered or not. Clicking here will redirect you in Overview Statistics with no filter
engaines_dashboard_tutorial_delivered_me: Here is the overall count of all your delivered messages. Clicking here will redirect you in Overview Statistics filtered by Delivered status
engaines_dashboard_tutorial_value_is_the: This value is the ratio from all delivered messages over all sent messages, shown as a percentage
engaines_dashboard_tutorial_delivered_me: Here is the overall count of delivered messages with Live Transfer interaction. Clicking here will redirect you in Overview Statistics filtered by Transfer Interactions
engaines_dashboard_tutorial_me_back_inte: Here is the overall count of delivered messages with Call me Back interaction. Clicking here will redirect you in Overview Statistics filtered by Callback Interactions
engaines_dashboard_tutorial_blacklist_in: Here is the overall count of delivered messages with Blacklist interaction. Clicking here will redirect you in Overview Statistics filtered by Blacklist Interactions
engaines_account_financials_forget_about: Forget about low credit issue! With autorecharge feature we will directly bill you when your balance goes lower than €5. To enable this function, confirm agreement on PayPal . You will be redirected to PayPal after checking the box .
engaines_account_financials_if_any_impor: If any import is specified, when the balance goes below the specified value, we will send an email notification alerting you about low balance condition
engaines_account_financials_every_discov: Every discovered message, will be billed with a minimum of 20’’ lenght. Write here your message's lenght if it is bigger than 20’’, to calculate the effective final cost
engaines_campaign_batch_batch_step_3_giv: Give more power to your message setting interactions or enabling additional features
engaines_campaign_batch_batch_step_3_if_: If enabled, system will wait for a human voice answer before delivering your message and, if not detected, it will not deliver. If disabled, all recipients may listen your voice message after they pick up the phone
engaines_campaign_batch_batch_step_3_rec: Let your recipients replay the voice message
Let your recipients request a free live transfer to you
Let your recipients request a recall from you
Let your recipients unsubscribe from your voice messages
finish_registration_step1_ste_up: Set up now your Caller ID
finish_registration_step1_creating_callb: For creating a CallBurn account you need to provide a valid phonenumber that will be used as your personal CallerID.  In this way your recipients will see your message coming with your phonenumber and they can easily identify you.
finish_registration_step1_after_registra: After registration you can also provide more CallerID and choose everytime which one use based on your preferences.
finish_registration_step1_send_verificat: Send verification code to this phonenumber
finish_registration_step1_a_voice_messag: A Voice Message is being sent now, keep your phone
finish_registration_step1_available_and_: available and take note of the verification code
finish_registration_step1_proceed_to_val: Proceed to validate your Caller ID
finish_registration_step2_for_assuring: For assuring your identity, please put here the received verification code
finish_registration_step2_verification_i: Verification it’s free but in case of too many mistakes we may temporary block your account for security reasons.  We have sent you this verification code to be sure that this phonenumber is under your property.
finish_registration_step2_your_caller_id: Your Caller ID is now ready to be used to send your voice messages
finish_registration_step4_i_want_to_rece: I want to receive Callburn newsletter with incredible discounts and special offers
finish_registration_step4_by_clicking: By clicking below button, you agree to the CallBurn
home_page_cheaper: Cheaper (save up to 70% compared to sms)
engaines_dashboard_dashboard_messages_wi: Here is the overall count of your created ClickToCall Snippets. Click here to see all details for every snippet, like total clicks, total cost and a lot of others useful informations

modals_camping_batch_activate_transfer_a: Activating this feature may cause variation of final message length including a second call to your callerid for make transfer possible
modals_camping_batch_activate_transfer_w: When your recipient asks for a
modals_camping_batch_activate_transfer_a: a second call to your CallerID number is made, and if successful, you will be connected to your recipient call (the one which is delivering voice message). In this way we bill two different costs, one for message and another one for transfering this messagecall to your callerid, at the same tariffs as normal messages (see more into
modals_camping_batch_activate_transfer_l: Look below graphics to see an example.
modals_camping_batch_activate_transfer_i: If you have any doubt or question, feel free to
modals_camping_batch_activate_transfer_c: Callburn launches the first call to deliver your message
modals_camping_batch_activate_transfer_r: recipient requests a transfer and listens a ringing tone until the second call is answered
modals_camping_batch_activate_transfer_a: A second call to your phone is made to connect the transfer
modals_camping_batch_activate_transfer_r: Remember to keep your Caller ID ready for receiving calls (free and under network coverage). If your callerid only supports 1 concurrent call consider limiting messages speed
modals_camping_batch_activate_transfer_i: In case of busy Caller ID, Callburn retries to deliver the transfer as long the recipients stays waiting on to be connected.
modals_camping_batch_activate_transfer_y: You can limit concurrent transfers on your phone. This may be useful when your phonenumber (your caller id ), receiving live transfers, doesn’t accept simultaneous calls (for example, a mobile supports only one talking person at time). When this limit is reached we will stop delivery, until the value is less than configured one.
modals_camping_batch_activate_transfer_c: Choose one or more phone numbers, from your caller ID list, where transfer calls
message_delivery_speed_modal_text_someti: Sometimes message delivery is too fast and we let you configure this settings by specifying in how much time deliver should be done (example, inside 60 minutes)
